Package model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Card
    emulates the game cards includes methods
    DiscardPile
    The stuck that player puts a card icludes methods and listeners
    Draw2
    Draw2 is a subclass of Card emulates "draw 2 cards" type cards in uno
    DrawPile
    The stuck that player draws a card with methods
    Pile
    the abstract class of the two card stucks
    Player
    emulates the game players
    Reverse
    Reverse is a subclass of Card emulates reverse type cards in uno
    SimpleCard
    SimpleCard is a subclass of Card emulates simple type cards in uno
    Skip
    Skip is a subclass of Card emulates skip type cards in uno
    UnoGame
    unogame class first initilises players, cards starts game then finds the winner and ends the game
    Wild
    Wild is a subclass of Card emulates Wild type cards in uno
    Wild4
    Wild4 is a subclass of Card emulates Wild 4 type cards in uno
